values:
in decmeber, there will be a Battle of The Bands at my school...

if anyone is interested in playing, let me know and i can give you contact information...


last year some kickass bands played, and this year is looking good too...so let me know...

"my hands are at your throat and I think I hate you
but still we'll say, 'remember when' just like we always do"...


p.s.


how much does life suck, when school is your only escape, but its one of the places you want to escape from...

once and for all the stupid people...the screen name is, dreamed your ego died...



being grounded is awful, i feel like im losing everyone... and i miss a ton of people, adam bcuz i loooove him, hanging out with court, bradon even if he does hate me, mark even tho i shouldnt and he hates me i sitll miss the good times, stepppphii, christine and meg and jenn (sometimes) and shannon and amanda and sarah, chris and unfortunatly enough to say mike...

p.s."point ur gun in another direction, now that uve cried urself to sleep"

i miss mark.
and i miss brandon.

my hair is so dark... its almost black, eh it will fade the next time i wash it and get a little redder. so to add to the scary shit thats been happening...the other me and court were driving, i started reaching for the mirror, but courtney didnt notice, and shes like can you fix the mirror, and i knew she was going to say it, without knowing the mirror needed to be moved...and then today was the worst, we were going to see her dad at work after getting my check, and we were on a back road, and i didnt have my seat belt on, and then i just suddenly grabbed it and put it on wicked fast, so courtney slowed down cuz she didnt know what was wrong, and we went around a blind turn and there was a truck backing up really fastly into the road...we would have hit it... so yup, fucking weird. and on with the hair...

so i really want to get around to gauging my ears bigger...but i reallly dont want to pay for another taper...so does anyone have a taper/stretcher bigger then 2 gauge that i could borrow? p.s. september 9th, The fiction we live. from autumn to ashes.
me and court went school...shopping... p.s. i cut my hair more, in the back tho, its real short

does anyone have an lj code i can borrow, i can get you one back...


i feel like one of those idiot people asking...

im sorry ill never be perfect p.s. heyy mom, dad. grounding me is not going to help. its just going to make me worse, depress me more, you are keeping me from the one thing i need, my friends. i hope you enjoy knowing you are the cause of my sadness. i hate you.

fuck you all.


wow you have no life.



mark, call me.
aniela kicks my ass.
courtney, member the discussion of corn bread.
brandon, you kicked so much ass last night.
whoever fucked with this, fuck you.

so, i may be needing to make some...apologies, i suppose you would call them. most of you know what ive been doing for the past 2 months (including the 'rents) and i was going through a lot of, tough, stuff. and i kinda lost hold of what i was doing. and i know, a lot of friends didnt really like what was happening, but i found myself in it. so i guess some good came out of it right? but my many apologies to whoever i hurt in this process, i suppose my only excuse was, well, the past 6 months, although very good at times, very, depressing and lonely at others. but im back on track, got someone whose making me feel better and happy, and well making me feel like me again. without all the crap i was doing before. so thank you for standing by me, for the ones that did. and if you didnt, i understand. just know, i found myself, who i am, really, who i am. my apologies to everyone i hurt, i love you all. and you all know it.

heres a few special ones...

eric, well where to begin with you. you are an great person and im glad ive been able to spend these last 6 months, good or bad with you. and i do still care about you. im sorry for everything i did to you, i realize now, i did it wrong. i did everything all wrong, and i really apologize. i also, well, want to thank you for helping through everything, for being there, and helping me learn a lot about myself. so im supposing this is my finally letting go of you, "no last kiss, and no goodbye" as from autumn to ashes says, this is my last goodbye. "i wish you joy and happiness, but above all things i wish you love"

courtney, i couldnt have asked for a better best friend. you are always there and hope you always will be, you know everything, and through it all, youve stayed by me. i cant wait till you get back so i can tell you everything. ive done some shitty things to you to im suspecting, so i apologize profusly, never meant to hurt you.

adam, well i suppose this is where i say you were right, and i was wrong. 

and mark, thanks, you make me so happy, and you are helping me get out of this, although you dont really know what most of this is, ill tell you tho. you put a smile on my face, and thats what i need now. im keeping my fingers crossed, cuz for some reason i think this could go good...<3 

p.s sorry for the emo/sappy stuff. needed to do it.

fuckkkkk you mother.


oh no, are you going to ground me now?! I know youre going to read this, cuz you have to invade my fuckkking privacy. Oh well. 

Enjoy.

your own kids dont even like you. Hahhaa. you suck at being a mom, oh what a fuckking surprise.
i would take my two fingers, trace them over your heart, and erase the mistakes, if only you would let me.

all through the night ill be standing over you all through the night ill be watching over you and through bad dreams ill be right there, holding you hand, telling you everything is all right and when you cry ill be right there telling you were never anything less than beautiful So dont you worry im your angel standing by ~+~A dry tongue Screams at the sky But the wind just breathes words in As a strange bird tries to fly Pieces of us die everyday As though our flesh were hell Such injustice, as children we are told that from god we fell. Where are my angels? Wheres my golden one? Wheres my hope now that my heroes have gone? Some are being beaten Some are being born. And some cant tell the difference anymore~+~ They remind her of her lover, how he left her, and of times long ago. When she used to color carelessly painted his portrait A thousand times-or maybe just his smile- And she and her canvas would follow him wherever he would go cuz they were painters and they were painting themselves A lovely world. Oil streaked daisies covered the living room wall He put water-colored roses in her hair He said, "Love, I love you, I want to give you mountains, the sunshine, the sunset too I want to give you everything as beautiful as you are to me~~ Embrace the faceless, the unnamed Kiss the flame ++++Ophelia drowned in the water Crushed by her own weight Hitler loved little blue eyed boys And it drove him to hate Birds always grow silent before the night descends cuz nature has a funny way of breaking what does not bend A heros torso built of steel and novocain His heart a bitter beat inside a bloodless frame There was a hole inside his soul a manicure could not fill So he fund himself a whore to love while daisies choked in the window sill Weve made houses for hatred Its time we made a place Where peoples souls may be seen and made safe Be careful with each other These fragile flames For innocence cant be lost It just needs to be maintained
courtney and mal no into needed here...the crew me and nate!! lol we ARE better than charlies angels. me and courtney at the ballon festival, trying on hats.. lol
im grounded, which equals, being very bored. so heres pics for your enjoyment :) or well, maybe not enjoyment...lol

ahh i want a boy. like really, im sick of this whole being single shit. i want a boy, all to myself, i dont wanna share. lol. i just want some to talk to before i got to sleep, to have their voice in my head while i fall asleep, feeling safe and cared for, right now i feel lonely. i want to have a boy that will come up behind me and just grab me, i and to hug him and just fall into place in his neck. blah. i miss that. i just dont want to be alone anymore.


but its not going to happen. 

i want what i had back.

its just a little crush, everytime we touch...


---------


blah blah.

court slept over last nite, we got up, got ready, went downtown to chill with scott and matt for a bit, went down to the park, so arielle, went home. LOL fun. blah.

i went to work, it sucked soooooooo bad. it was toooo fuckking hott.


courtney, im really getting worried...

i cant stand to see this chick writing about you, and putting hearts around your name, and getting all thses details about you wrong, like writing mike, instead of micheal, i mean come on, thats fucking ridiculous, i cant stand that she wants you, and most likely you want her, and its not me that you care about anymore, it hurts, it burns, she has these nicknames for you, you walk on the beach with her... and its not me. and wow, that hurts, like seroiusly. i cant explain it. but it makes me cry.

fuck this.

i [heart] you.">

i found a leter i worte you today.
And i remember how i felt at that moment.
On top of hte world with you, holding me there.
Above everything, above the pain, above the suffering that we moved past.
And you kept me floating with teardrops of love.
But i fell.
I fell from the utopian dream
Hearing your name now is like cutting flesh.
Each time it gets a little easier.
With every movement of the blade a little more relief comes, in knowing thatyou are doing well.

p.s. it was a page filled with i love you's.

gonna hang out with aaron on friday, hopefully.
bored. someone call me.

diap up sucks.


you're so crazy
<bold>enough in a way that I'll probably say you destroyed me <bold>>

for awhile I was cleaner than now
then I started to destroy myself
with things that i love now the things that i hate
until it finally broke me 

fuck my ass 

choke me

yea so what did i do now? i give up. you dont want to be with me, why should i aim to please you constantly then? i dont understand you. i did, i dont now. oh well i guess right?



why do i constantly sit down for this all you can eat character assassination?


<bold>"i cant reason with you
i speak words you can't hear
social conditioning left you with deafened ears
so i take your face in hand
see that look in your eyes
that rigormortis stare,
that look that i despise
and so i turn from you
i walk these streets alone
alone i search for truth
ideal that you've disowned
and wait with fingers crossed
and pray you'll someday find
a way to see things though your own eyes"




<small>...im not ready to walk into this world <small>

Don't tell me, tell me what I already know

Long sighs, sad eyes and twelve hour drives

This city is quiet, it feels like we own it
But nothing really lasts forever
And we know it

It had started to rain, but we didn't care
Every word that was spoken
Held onto the air
Like a ghosts and floated towards the sky
I pulled my jacket tight,
And the city lit up the night""

hi mom and dad. since apperently you read this, do you feel pretty cool prying into MY life? im a teenager, let me live like one. your not going to control everything I do, by reading this. so stop.

"ive found the person who speaks my name like poetry,"
but its fallen from grace, fallen from benediction.
gun shot bird, falls from the sky, much like i fell.
much like i am still falling, away from you.
and this time, you are not there to secure me when i fall.
you are only there to grasp me, grasp around my neck,
as your hands create my noose. just as it was always meant to be,
just as it will always be.

and in one moment of irrefutable positivity,
i think, i hope, maybe, just maybe,
then insecurity lays foundation in me, yet again.

beautifully lit amber sky, turns dark fades to grey, fades to nothingness.
moon rises in the unknown darkness, and you, the only one i wish to be with, arent here to see it with me. in my akward silence i stand in the moonlit shadow.
and you, the one that names me like poety, is gone.

love doesnt die, but it fades, you say it fades like summer, i say it doesnt, because summer always returns.

and the bird, or i, or maybe just the bird, continues to fall, past the lovely trees. 
to be ripped apart and eaten by the dogs below.
<b> shoot me, and get it over with, let rays of sun reflect of the blood stain around me, let rays of sun shine through me, make me pretty again.
